name: Vintage Scrabble Ring
description:
Lovely little letter rings, designed by scrabble and made into rings by us.
If you can't find the letter you would like it is because its been popular and vintage sets are hard to come by. 
If you would like to drop us an email letting us know you'd like those missing letters then we will send out more troops on the constant board game hunt. If/When we find some we will endeavour to let you know ASAP

All of these rings (as stated above) are made with recycled/used/vintage scrabble pieces from often very old sets, so there may be differences in the print on each letter. 

All are made with adjustable rings so will fit all sizes. 
All are shipped with a cute little drawstring bag.
If this will be a gift we can include a small flatpack gift box for an extra 50p just add this to your order and you'll be charged no extra shipping.

unfortunately we do not accept returns but we like to think we're nice people so drop us an email if you have any questions or issues with an order.

Thank you
